TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows the player to pick the trait of their choice
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Permet au joueur de choisir un trait de son choix.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Erlaubt freie Wahl einer Eigenschaft und deren Wechsel
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows the player to pick the trait of their choice
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows the player to pick the trait of their choice

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Leader cannot adopt a state religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reduces the chance religions will spread to the leader's cities
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Le dirigeant ne peut pas choisir de religion d'état.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Réduit la probabilité qu'une religion se répande dans les villes de la civilisation.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kann keine Staatsreligion annehmen[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Verminderter religiöser Einfluss auf eigene Städte
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Leader cannot adopt a state religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reduces the chance religions will spread to the leader's cities
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Leader cannot adopt a state religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reduces the chance religions will spread to the leader's cities

TEXT.English: Gain the Aggressive Trait, Lose the Important Status.
TEXT.French: Obtenir le trait Aggressif, perdre le Statut de Dirigeant Important.
TEXT.German: Gain the Aggressive Trait, Lose the Important Status.
TEXT.Italian: Gain the Aggressive Trait, Lose the Important Status.
TEXT.Spanish: Gain the Aggressive Trait, Lose the Important Status.

TEXT.English: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective doesn't play nice with others and has gained the Aggressive Trait.
TEXT.French: Des rumeurs indiquent que le dirigeant des %s1_civ_adjective n'est pas tendre avec les autres et a obtenu le trait Aggressif.
TEXT.German: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective doesn't play nice with others and has gained the Aggressive Trait.
TEXT.Italian: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective doesn't play nice with others and has gained the Aggressive Trait.
TEXT.Spanish: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective doesn't play nice with others and has gained the Aggressive Trait.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aggressive[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Free Promotion (Combat I)[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Recon Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Archery Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Mounted Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Melee Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Arcane Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Disciple Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Double Production Speed of Shipyard, Siege Workshop, Stable
TEXT.French: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aggressif[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Promotion Gratuite (Combat I)[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Éclaireurs[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Archers[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Unités Montées[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Unités de Mélée[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Unités Magiques[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Disciples[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Double la vitesse de Production du Chantier Naval, de l'Atelier de Siège, et des Écuries
TEXT.German: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aggressiv[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Freie Beförderung (Kampf I)[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Aufklärungseinheiten[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Bogeneinheiten[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Berittene Einheiten[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Nahkampfeinheiten[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Magische Einheiten[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Geweihte Einheiten[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Doppelte Produktionsgeschwindigkeit für Schiffswerft, Werkstatt für Belagerungswaffen, Ställe
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aggressive[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Free Promotion (Combat I)[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Recon Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Archery Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Mounted Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Melee Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Arcane Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Disciple Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Double Production Speed of Shipyard, Siege Workshop, Stable
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aggressive[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Free Promotion (Combat I)[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Recon Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Archery Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Mounted Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Melee Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Arcane Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Disciple Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Double Production Speed of Shipyard, Siege Workshop, Stable

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reduced level requirements to upgrade Arcane units
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les prérequis de niveau pour améliorer les unités magiques sont réduits
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reduziert Levelanforderung für die Modernisierung von magischen Einheiten
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reduced level requirements to upgrade Arcane units
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reduced level requirements to upgrade Arcane units

TEXT.English: Gain the Arcane Trait, Lose the Important Status.
TEXT.French: Obtenir le trait Magicien, perdre le Statut de Dirigeant Important.
TEXT.German: Gain the Arcane Trait, Lose the Important Status.
TEXT.Italian: Gain the Arcane Trait, Lose the Important Status.
TEXT.Spanish: Gain the Arcane Trait, Lose the Important Status.

TEXT.English: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has displayed magical prowess and gained the Arcane Trait.
TEXT.French: Des rumeurs indiquent que le dirigeant des %s1_civ_adjective a accompli des prouesses magiques et a obtenu le trait Magicien.
TEXT.German: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has displayed magical prowess and gained the Arcane Trait.
TEXT.Italian: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has displayed magical prowess and gained the Arcane Trait.
TEXT.Spanish: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has displayed magical prowess and gained the Arcane Trait.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Arcane[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Free Promotion (Potency)[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Arcane Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Double Production Speed of Mage Guild
TEXT.French: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Magicien[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Promotion Gratuite (Affinité Arcanique)[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Unités Magiques[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Double la vitesse de Production de la Guilde des Mages
TEXT.German: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Magisch[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Freie Beförderung (Magiebegabung)[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Magische Einheiten[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Doppelte Produktionsgeschwindigkeit für Magischer Zirkel
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Arcane[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Free Promotion (Potency)[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Arcane Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Double Production Speed of Mage Guild
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Arcane[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Free Promotion (Potency)[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Arcane Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Double Production Speed of Mage Guild

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Captured cities build their original civilization's units and buildings instead of the owning civilization (so a captured Calabim city would still be able to build Vampires and Governor's Manors)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]This ability does not allow the building of other civilization's heroes
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les villes capturées construisent les bâtiments et unités spécifiques à leur civilisations originelles au lieu de ceux de la civilisation conquérante (par exemple une ville Calabim conquise pourrait toujours produire des Vampires et des Manoirs de Gouverneur)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cette capacité ne permet pas la production des héros d'une autre civilisation
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Eroberte Städte bauen die Einheiten und Gebäude ihrer ursprünglichen Zivilisation anstelle der ihrer neuen (d.h. eine eroberte Stadt der Calabim wird weiterhin in der Lage sein, Vampire und die Gruft des Grafen zu bauen).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Diese Fähigkeit ermöglicht es jedoch nicht, die Helden anderer Zivilisationen aufzustellen.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Captured cities build their original civilization's units and buildings instead of the owning civilization (so a captured Calabim city would still be able to build Vampires and Governor's Manors)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]This ability does not allow the building of other civilization's heroes
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Captured cities build their original civilization's units and buildings instead of the owning civilization (so a captured Calabim city would still be able to build Vampires and Governor's Manors)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]This ability does not allow the building of other civilization's heroes

TEXT.French: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Charismatique[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_HAPPY]/Ville[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]-25% XP nécessaires pour la promotion des unités
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Confère la [LINK=PROMOTION_SELF_REPAIRING_GOLEM]Self Repairing[\LINK] à tous les Golems.

TEXT.English: Gain the Creative Trait, Lose the Important Status.
TEXT.French: Obtenir le trait Créatif, perdre le Statut de Dirigeant Important.
TEXT.German: Gain the Creative Trait, Lose the Important Status.
TEXT.Italian: Gain the Creative Trait, Lose the Important Status.
TEXT.Spanish: Gain the Creative Trait, Lose the Important Status.

TEXT.English: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has displayed great vision and gained the Creative Trait.
TEXT.French: Des rumeurs indiquent que le dirigeant des %s1_civ_adjective a exposé fait part de grandes visions et a obtenu le trait Créatif.
TEXT.German: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has displayed great vision and gained the Creative Trait.
TEXT.Italian: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has displayed great vision and gained the Creative Trait.
TEXT.Spanish: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has displayed great vision and gained the Creative Trait.

TEXT.French: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Créatif[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_CULTURE]/Ville[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Double la vitesse de Production du Carnaval, et du Monument

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Summoned Skeletons gain the Melee combat type
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les Squelettes invoqués obtiennent le type de combat Mélée
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Summoned Skeletons gain the Melee combat type
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Summoned Skeletons gain the Melee combat type

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Modifies culture change after a defeat by %d1%.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Diminue la Culture après chaque défaite de %d1%.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Modifiziert die Kulturänderung nach einer Niederlage im Kampf um %d1%.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Modifies culture change after a defeat by %d1%.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Modifies culture change after a defeat by %d1%.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants [LINK=PROMOTION_HOMELAND]Homeland[\LINK] to all units inside your team's territory[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants [LINK=PROMOTION_HARDY1]Hardy I[\LINK] to all your worker units.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Fournit la promotion [LINK=PROMOTION_HOMELAND]Mère Patrie[\LINK] à toutes les unités à l'intérieur des frontières de votre équipe[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants [LINK=PROMOTION_HARDY1]Hardy I[\LINK] to all your worker units.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Verleiht allen Einheiten innerhalb der Teamgrenzen die Beförderung [LINK=PROMOTION_HOMELAND]Heimisch[\LINK][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants [LINK=PROMOTION_HARDY1]Hardy I[\LINK] to all your worker units.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants [LINK=PROMOTION_HOMELAND]Homeland[\LINK] to all units inside your team's territory[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants [LINK=PROMOTION_HARDY1]Hardy I[\LINK] to all your worker units.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants [LINK=PROMOTION_HOMELAND]Homeland[\LINK] to all units inside your team's territory[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants [LINK=PROMOTION_HARDY1]Hardy I[\LINK] to all your worker units.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Financial[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] on Plots with 2[ICON_COMMERCE] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Double Production Speed of Money Changer, Market, Exchange

TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les frontières ne sont pas influencées par les combats.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Die Grenzen werden nicht durch Kampf beeinflusst.

TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Confère la promotion [LINK=PROMOTION_HORSELORD]Seigneur Équestre[\LINK] à toutes les unités Montées

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows [LINK=UNIT_ASPIRANT]Aspirants[\LINK] to be born in your empire[NEWLINE]
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows [LINK=UNIT_ASPIRANT]Aspirants[\LINK] to be born in your empire[NEWLINE]
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows [LINK=UNIT_ASPIRANT]Aspirants[\LINK] to be born in your empire[NEWLINE]

TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows [LINK=UNIT_ASPIRANT]Aspirants[\LINK] to be born in your empire[NEWLINE]

TEXT.English: Iram Damarr's firm belief in the potential of humanity, and his willingness to share the power and secrets of the Mekara with the people to fulfil that potential, lets him draw on the significant productive assets of the population to a greater extent. Having their willing and eager support also leads to many of them volonteering for military duties, to protect their fledgeling nation.
TEXT.French: La ferme foi d'Iram Damarr dans le potentiel de l'humanité, et la volonté de partager le pouvoir et les secrets des Mekaras avec tous pour réaliser ce potentiel lui permet d'attirer à lui une plus large part des acteurs importants de la population. Avoir leur soutien sans faille permet également à beaucoup d'entre eux de se porter volontaires pour le service militaire, afin de protéger leur nation naissante.
TEXT.German: Iram Damarr's firm belief in the potential of humanity, and his willingness to share the power and secrets of the Mekara with the people to fulfil that potential, lets him draw on the significant productive assets of the population to a greater extent. Having their willing and eager support also leads to many of them volonteering for military duties, to protect their fledgeling nation.
TEXT.Italian: Iram Damarr's firm belief in the potential of humanity, and his willingness to share the power and secrets of the Mekara with the people to fulfil that potential, lets him draw on the significant productive assets of the population to a greater extent. Having their willing and eager support also leads to many of them volonteering for military duties, to protect their fledgeling nation.
TEXT.Spanish: Iram Damarr's firm belief in the potential of humanity, and his willingness to share the power and secrets of the Mekara with the people to fulfil that potential, lets him draw on the significant productive assets of the population to a greater extent. Having their willing and eager support also leads to many of them volonteering for military duties, to protect their fledgeling nation.

TEXT.English: Touched by the precept of Ice, this leader suffers no anarchy when changing civics.
TEXT.French: Convaincu par les préceptes de la Glace, ce dirigeant peut changer de doctrines sans déclencher d'anarchie.
TEXT.German: Touched by the precept of Ice, this leader suffers no anarchy when changing civics.
TEXT.Italian: Touched by the precept of Ice, this leader suffers no anarchy when changing civics.
TEXT.Spanish: Touched by the precept of Ice, this leader suffers no anarchy when changing civics.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities won't change population due to food
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les villes ne varieront pas en population via la nourriture.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Die Stadtbevölkerung wird sich nicht in Abhängigkeit der Nahrung ändern.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities won't change population due to food
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities won't change population due to food

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Founded cities starts with a cultural level of 2

TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Neue Städte beginnen mit einem Kulturlevel von 2
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Founded cities starts with a cultural level of 2
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Founded cities starts with a cultural level of 2

TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Permet au combat d'influer sur la Culture.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Erlaubt die Beeinflussung der Kultur durch Kampf.

TEXT.English: Gain the Industrious Trait, Lose the Important Status.

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Industrious[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]+50% Wonder Production[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Free Promotion (Skilled I)[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Worker Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Double Production Speed of Dwarven Smithy, Artisan's Workshop
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Industrious[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]+50% Wonder Production[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Free Promotion (Skilled I)[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Worker Units[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Double Production Speed of Dwarven Smithy, Artisan's Workshop

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Free [LINK=PROMOTION_CORNED_POWDER]Corned Powder[\LINK] for Gunpowder based units.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Confère la promotion [LINK=PROMOTION_CORNED_POWDER]Poudre Grenue[\LINK] à toutes les unités utilisant la poudre à canon.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Freie Beförderung "Gekörntes Pulver" für alle Schießpulver Einheiten
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Free Corned Powder for Gunpowder based units.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Free Corned Powder for Gunpowder based units.

TEXT.French: La poudre grenue a plus de force que celle qui est en poussiere ; parce que l'air se trouve comprimé dans chacun de ses grains, et les gros grains font plus d'effet que les petits ; c'est pourquoi les grains de poudre à canon sont toujours plus gros que ceux des autres poudres, et en chargeant une piece d'artillerie, il ne faut point briser les grains.

TEXT.English: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has improved unit training.
TEXT.French: Des rumeurs indiquent que le dirigeant des %s1_civ_adjective a amélioré l'entraînement de ses unités et a obtenu le trait Ingéniosité.
TEXT.German: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has improved unit training.
TEXT.Italian: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has improved unit training.
TEXT.Spanish: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has improved unit training.

TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Limite initiale de population des villes : %d1 (Peut être augmenté)

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Three traits are generated randomly and switch randomly during the game
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Trois traits de caractère sont choisis aléatoirement et changent aléatoirement durant la partie.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Drei Eigenschaften werden wahllos und stetig wechselnd neu generiert
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Three traits are generated randomly and switch randomly during the game
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Three traits are generated randomly and switch randomly during the game

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants one free promotion to all built units.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Can Build Command Posts.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Confère une promotion gratuite à toutes les unités produites.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Überträgt eine freie Beförderung auf alle gebauten Einheiten
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants one free promotion to all built units.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants one free promotion to all built units.

TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ne peut pas se convertir à une religion

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The leader despise the gods, hating everyone who happens to follow them
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Le dirigeant méprise les dieux, et hait quiconque a la foi
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Der Anführer hasst alle Götter, und alle, die ihnen folgen.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The leader despise the gods, hating everyone who happens to follow them
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The leader despise the gods, hating everyone who happens to follow them

TEXT.English: As the Mekara Order's Master, Jamal has considerable influence over the it's members, commanding the loyalty of many of them, and the obedience of all of them. This allows him access to considerable resources, that others would find hard to achieve.
TEXT.French: En tant que Maître de l'Ordre Mékara, Jamal a une influence considérable sur ses membres, commandant la loyauté de beaucoup d'entre eux, et l'obséquiosité de tous. Ça lui donne accès à des ressources considérables, dont l'obtention par d'autres serait difficile.
TEXT.German: As the Mekara Order's Master, Jamal has considerable influence over the it's members, commanding the loyalty of many of them, and the obedience of all of them. This allows him access to considerable resources, that others would find hard to achieve.
TEXT.Italian: As the Mekara Order's Master, Jamal has considerable influence over the it's members, commanding the loyalty of many of them, and the obedience of all of them. This allows him access to considerable resources, that others would find hard to achieve.
TEXT.Spanish: As the Mekara Order's Master, Jamal has considerable influence over the it's members, commanding the loyalty of many of them, and the obedience of all of them. This allows him access to considerable resources, that others would find hard to achieve.

TEXT.French: Obtenir le trait Résistant à la Magie.
Obtenir le trait Résistant à la Magie.

TEXT.English: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has acquired magical defenses.
TEXT.French: Des rumeurs indiquent que le dirigeant des %s1_civ_adjective a fait l'acquisition de défenses magiques et a obtenu le trait Résistant à la Magie.
TEXT.German: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has acquired magical defenses.
TEXT.Italian: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has acquired magical defenses.
TEXT.Spanish: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has acquired magical defenses.

TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Limite maximale de population des villes : %d1 (Ne peut pas être augmenté)

TEXT.Spanish: Gain the Organized Trait, Lose the Important Status.

TEXT.French: Des rumeurs indiquent que le dirigeant des %s1_civ_adjective est devenu un comptable efficace et a obtenu le trait Organisé.

TEXT.Spanish: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective has become proficient in accounting and gained the Organized Trait.

TEXT.French: [COLOR_ALT_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Organisé[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]-50% d'entretien des Doctrines[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET]Double la vitesse de Production du Tribunal et du Phare

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Multiple items can be constructed each turn, if production is sufficient.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Plusieurs objets peuvent être faits chaque tour si la production le permet.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Wenn die Produktion ausreicht, können mehrere Dinge je Runde produziert werden.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Multiple items can be constructed each turn, if production is sufficient.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Multiple items can be constructed each turn, if production is sufficient.

TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Augmente la culture après un pillage de %d1%.

TEXT.English: Gain the Raiders Trait, Lose the Important Status.
TEXT.French: Obtenir le trait Pillard, perdre le Statut de Dirigeant Important.
TEXT.German: Gain the Raiders Trait, Lose the Important Status.
TEXT.Italian: Gain the Raiders Trait, Lose the Important Status.
TEXT.Spanish: Gain the Raiders Trait, Lose the Important Status.

TEXT.English: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective likes to destroy nice things and gained the Raiders Trait.
TEXT.French: Des rumeurs indiquent que le dirigeant des %s1_civ_adjective aime détruire les jolies choses et a obtenu le trait Pillard.

TEXT.Spanish: Rumor has it that a leader of the %s1_civ_adjective likes to destroy nice things and gained the Raiders Trait.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Decreases happiness and culture, while providing the Slaver promotion and improving civic upkeep.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Diminue le bonheur et la culture, tout en conférant la promotion [LINK=PROMOTION_SLAVER]Esclavagiste[\LINK] et améliorant l'entretien doctrinal.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Senkt die Zufriedenheit und Kultur, liefert dafür die Sklavenhalter Beförderung und erleichtert den Unterhalt des Staates.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Decreases happiness and culture, while providing the Slaver promotion and improving civic upkeep.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Decreases happiness and culture, while providing the Slaver promotion and improving civic upkeep.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants [LINK=PROMOTION_SINISTER]Sinister[\LINK] to all Recon and Rogue units
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Confère la promotion [LINK=PROMOTION_SINISTER]Sinistre[\LINK] à toutes les unités de Reconnaissance
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants [LINK=PROMOTION_SINISTER]Sinister[\LINK] to all Recon and Rogue units
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants [LINK=PROMOTION_SINISTER]Sinister[\LINK] to all Recon and Rogue units

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Conquered cities lose half of their population, and spawn one slave unit for every two population lost.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les villes conquises perdent la moitié de leur population, et font apparaître un eclave pour chaque groupe de deux population perdues.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Eroberte Städte verlieren die älfte ihrer Bevölkerung, aus je zwei Punkten wird je ein Sklave errichtet
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Conquered cities lose half of their population, and spawn one slave unit for every two population lost.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Conquered cities lose half of their population, and spawn one slave unit for every two population lost.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Increases the chance for cities to generate Spiders.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Spiders will spawn with the [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDERKIN]Spiderkin[\LINK] promotion once the Nest reaches size 10.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All other units are born with the [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDERKIN]Spiderkin[\LINK] promotion once the Nest reaches size 15.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Augmente les chances que les villes génèrent des Araignées.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les Araignées démarrent avec la promotion [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDERKIN]Arachnomorphe[\LINK] une fois que la Tanière atteint 10 de population.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Toutes les autes unités démarrent avec la promotion [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDERKIN]Arachnomorphe[\LINK] une fois que la Tanière atteint 15 de population.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Erhöht die Wahrscheinlichkeit in Stödten, Spinnen zu erschaffen[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Spinnen werden ab einer Nestgröße von 10 mit der [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDERKIN]Spinnentier[\LINK] Beförderung geboren[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Andere Einheiten erhalten die [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDERKIN]Spinnentier[\LINK] Beförderung ab einer Nestgröße von 15
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Increases the chance for cities to generate Spiders.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Spiders will spawn with the [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDERKIN]Spiderkin[\LINK] promotion once the Nest reaches size 10.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All other units are born with the [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDERKIN]Spiderkin[\LINK] promotion once the Nest reaches size 15.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Increases the chance for cities to generate Spiders.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Spiders will spawn with the [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDERKIN]Spiderkin[\LINK] promotion once the Nest reaches size 10.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All other units are born with the [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDERKIN]Spiderkin[\LINK] promotion once the Nest reaches size 15.

TEXT.French: Obtenir le trait Spirituel, perdre le Statut de Dirigeant Important.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities are able to work the 3rd plot ring instead of just the first 2[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player has a limited number of cities (amount determined by map size)
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les villes peuvent travailler sur un rayon de trois cases au lieu de deux[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Le joueur n'a accès qu'à un nombre limité de villes (déterminé par la taille de la carte).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]La vitesse d'expansion des frontières culturelles est accélérée.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Städte können 3 anstelle von 2 Stadtfeldringen bewirtschaften[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kulturelle Grenzen sind erweitert
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities are able to work the 3rd plot ring instead of just the first 2[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player has a limited number of cities (amount determined by map size)
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities are able to work the 3rd plot ring instead of just the first 2[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player has a limited number of cities (amount determined by map size)

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants Battle Field Tactics to all Commander Units.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Confère la promotion [LINK=PROMOTION_GC_BATTLEFIELD_TACTICS]Stratège de Terrain[\LINK] à tous les Généraux Illustres.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Liefert allen Kommandanten Einheiten die Beförderung Schlachtfeldtaktiken
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants Battle Field Tactics to all Commander Units.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants Battle Field Tactics to all Commander Units.

TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Augmente la durée des unités évoquées de %d1

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The leader is following a personal cult, upsetting other religions
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Le dirigeant pratique un culte personnel, irritant les autres religions
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Der Anführer ist Teil eines Personenkults, was zu Irritationen mit anderen Religionen führt
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The leader is following a personal cult, upsetting other religions
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The leader is following a personal cult, upsetting other religions

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Modifies culture change after a victory by %d1%.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Augmente la Culture après chaque victoire de %d1%.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Modifiziert die Kulturänderung nach einem Sieg im Kampf um %d1%.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Modifies culture change after a victory by %d1%.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Modifies culture change after a victory by %d1%.

TEXT.English: Zaria has at her disposal an extensive network of spies and assassins, as well as a propaganda machine, in the form of the [LINK=UNIT_CARETAKER]Caretakers[\LINK]. This allows her to recruit talented [LINK=UNIT_AGENT]Agents[\LINK] for her cause, as well as the [LINK=UNIT_CARETAKER_MATRON]Caretaker Matrons[\LINK] and the powerful [LINK=UNIT_ADJUNCT]Adjuncts[\LINK]. She also hosts lavish Colosseum events where Slaves can [LINK=SPELL_ENTER_ARENA]Enter the Arena[\LINK]
TEXT.French: Zaria has at her disposal an extensive network of spies and assassins, as well as a propaganda machine, in the form of the [LINK=UNIT_CARETAKER]Caretakers[\LINK]. This allows her to recruit talented [LINK=UNIT_AGENT]Agents[\LINK] for her cause, as well as the [LINK=UNIT_CARETAKER_MATRON]Caretaker Matrons[\LINK] and the powerful [LINK=UNIT_ADJUNCT]Adjuncts[\LINK]. She also hosts lavish Colosseum events where Slaves can [LINK=SPELL_ENTER_ARENA]Enter the Arena[\LINK]
TEXT.German: Zaria has at her disposal an extensive network of spies and assassins, as well as a propaganda machine, in the form of the Caretakers. This allows her to recruit talented Agents for her cause, as well as the Caretaker Matrons and the powerful Adjuncts.
TEXT.Italian: Zaria has at her disposal an extensive network of spies and assassins, as well as a propaganda machine, in the form of the Caretakers. This allows her to recruit talented Agents for her cause, as well as the Caretaker Matrons and the powerful Adjuncts.
TEXT.Spanish: Zaria has at her disposal an extensive network of spies and assassins, as well as a propaganda machine, in the form of the Caretakers. This allows her to recruit talented Agents for her cause, as well as the Caretaker Matrons and the powerful Adjuncts.

TEXT.English: Necromancer is an emergent trait focusing on the corrupted Death art of Necromancy. To unlock its full potential, be sure to cast spells, build and use units, control lands and wonders affiliated to the Death sphere.
TEXT.French: Necromancer is an emergent trait focusing on the corrupted Death art of Necromancy. To unlock its full potential, be sure to cast spells, build and use units, control lands and wonders affiliated to the Death sphere.
TEXT.German: Necromancer is an emergent trait focusing on the corrupted Death art of Necromancy. To unlock its full potential, be sure to cast spells, build and use units, control lands and wonders affiliated to the Death sphere.
TEXT.Italian: Necromancer is an emergent trait focusing on the corrupted Death art of Necromancy. To unlock its full potential, be sure to cast spells, build and use units, control lands and wonders affiliated to the Death sphere.
TEXT.Spanish: Necromancer is an emergent trait focusing on the corrupted Death art of Necromancy. To unlock its full potential, be sure to cast spells, build and use units, control lands and wonders affiliated to the Death sphere.

TEXT.English: Hydromancer is an emergent trait focusing of manipulating Water. Coastal cities, along with a strong Water-oriented magical army are a must to help it unlock its full potential.
TEXT.French: Hydromancer is an emergent trait focusing of manipulating Water. Coastal cities, along with a strong Water-oriented magical army are a must to help it unlock its full potential.
TEXT.German: Hydromancer is an emergent trait focusing of manipulating Water. Coastal cities, along with a strong Water-oriented magical army are a must to help it unlock its full potential.
TEXT.Italian: Hydromancer is an emergent trait focusing of manipulating Water. Coastal cities, along with a strong Water-oriented magical army are a must to help it unlock its full potential.
TEXT.Spanish: Hydromancer is an emergent trait focusing of manipulating Water. Coastal cities, along with a strong Water-oriented magical army are a must to help it unlock its full potential.

TEXT.English: The strategy to make the better of the Spiderkin emergent trait is scaringly simple. Have your spiders fight. Have your spiders kill. Have your spiders grow.
TEXT.French: The strategy to make the better of the Spiderkin emergent trait is scaringly simple. Have your spiders fight. Have your spiders kill. Have your spiders grow.
TEXT.German: The strategy to make the better of the Spiderkin emergent trait is scaringly simple. Have your spiders fight. Have your spiders kill. Have your spiders grow.
TEXT.Italian: The strategy to make the better of the Spiderkin emergent trait is scaringly simple. Have your spiders fight. Have your spiders kill. Have your spiders grow.
TEXT.Spanish: The strategy to make the better of the Spiderkin emergent trait is scaringly simple. Have your spiders fight. Have your spiders kill. Have your spiders grow.

TEXT.English: The Theocratic emergent trait stands on two pillars: A united mankind under a powerful faith. To unlock its full potential, strengthen your state religion while purging heresy and lesser species.
TEXT.French: The Theocratic emergent trait stands on two pillars: A united mankind under a powerful faith. To unlock its full potential, strengthen your state religion while purging heresy and lesser species.
TEXT.German: The Theocratic emergent trait stands on two pillars: A united mankind under a powerful faith. To unlock its full potential, strengthen your state religion while purging heresy and lesser species.
TEXT.Italian: The Theocratic emergent trait stands on two pillars: A united mankind under a powerful faith. To unlock its full potential, strengthen your state religion while purging heresy and lesser species.
TEXT.Spanish: The Theocratic emergent trait stands on two pillars: A united mankind under a powerful faith. To unlock its full potential, strengthen your state religion while purging heresy and lesser species.

TEXT.English: To get the most use of the Scorched Earth emergent trait, just listen to your inner Barbarian. Burn, Pillage, Kill and Raze!
TEXT.French: To get the most use of the Scorched Earth emergent trait, just listen to your inner Barbarian. Burn, Pillage, Kill and Raze!
TEXT.German: To get the most use of the Scorched Earth emergent trait, just listen to your inner Barbarian. Burn, Pillage, Kill and Raze!
TEXT.Italian: To get the most use of the Scorched Earth emergent trait, just listen to your inner Barbarian. Burn, Pillage, Kill and Raze!
TEXT.Spanish: To get the most use of the Scorched Earth emergent trait, just listen to your inner Barbarian. Burn, Pillage, Kill and Raze!

TEXT.English: Hills and Mines and Mineral bonuses. Those are the keys of the Veinhunter emergent trait. Along with honoring Kilmorph of course.
TEXT.French: Hills and Mines and Mineral bonuses. Those are the keys of the Veinhunter emergent trait. Along with honoring Kilmorph of course.
TEXT.German: Hills and Mines and Mineral bonuses. Those are the keys of the Veinhunter emergent trait. Along with honoring Kilmorph of course.
TEXT.Italian: Hills and Mines and Mineral bonuses. Those are the keys of the Veinhunter emergent trait. Along with honoring Kilmorph of course.
TEXT.Spanish: Hills and Mines and Mineral bonuses. Those are the keys of the Veinhunter emergent trait. Along with honoring Kilmorph of course.

TEXT.English: A large, healthy and happy population protected by a Centaur army, that's the objective of the Egalitarian emergent trait.
TEXT.French: A large, healthy and happy population protected by a Centaur army, that's the objective of the Egalitarian emergent trait.
TEXT.German: A large, healthy and happy population protected by a Centaur army, that's the objective of the Egalitarian emergent trait.
TEXT.Italian: A large, healthy and happy population protected by a Centaur army, that's the objective of the Egalitarian emergent trait.
TEXT.Spanish: A large, healthy and happy population protected by a Centaur army, that's the objective of the Egalitarian emergent trait.

TEXT.English: Two objectives for the Virtuous Pirate emergent trait. First, use your navy to control the oceans. Then, once the seas are safe, expand your trade opportunities.
TEXT.French: Two objectives for the Virtuous Pirate emergent trait. First, use your navy to control the oceans. Then, once the seas are safe, expand your trade opportunities.
TEXT.German: Two objectives for the Virtuous Pirate emergent trait. First, use your navy to control the oceans. Then, once the seas are safe, expand your trade opportunities.
TEXT.Italian: Two objectives for the Virtuous Pirate emergent trait. First, use your navy to control the oceans. Then, once the seas are safe, expand your trade opportunities.
TEXT.Spanish: Two objectives for the Virtuous Pirate emergent trait. First, use your navy to control the oceans. Then, once the seas are safe, expand your trade opportunities.
